## A quick sentiment analysis of moby dick

```{r}
# lyrics %>% 
#   select(word) %>%
#   anti_join(stop_words, by = "word") %>%
#   count(word) %>%
#   filter(n >= 50) %>%
#   with(wordcloud(word, n))

lyrics %>% 
  select(word) %>%
  anti_join(stop_words, by = "word") %>%
  count(word) %>%
  filter(n >= 50) %>%
  with(wordcloud(words = word, freq = n, min.freq = 1, random.order = FALSE, rot.per = 0.35, colors = brewer.pal(8, "Dark2")))

#  with(wordcloud(word, n max.words = 100))




```
